title: Priceless
description: "My name is Rylee, and I am a Tracker."When children go missing, and the Humans have no leads, I'm the one they call. I am their last hope in bringing home the lost ones. I salvage what they cannot.I'm on the FBI's wanted list. I have a werewolf for a pet, a Witch of a best friend, and I have no need for anyone else in my life.But when a salvage starts to spin out of control, help comes from a most unexpected direction.One that is dangerously dark, brooding, and doesn't know a thing about the supernatural.One whose kisses set me on fire.
author: Shannon Mayer
